thread.title: Victor Morton
thread.title_full: Servicing Stop reviewed by Victor Morton

author: Victor Morton
title: Victor Morton
text:
I was rather shocked to hear that my car had failed the MOT on so many things, and obviously as it is not a popular car it does cost a lot when it comes to buying parts for it, however, the operator that I had a call from was very good and he explained everything to me that had to be done, I think its a very good service as I did not have to drive the car anywhere, it was picked up and brought back to me in the time that was specified, and I would recommend them to anyone, so thank you Servicing Stop.
Mr Victor Morton ( Dodge Nitro )
